page.title: 01THORPE-LE-SOKEN DESCRIPTION
page.content: THORPE-LE-SOKEN IS A FAIRLY LARGE VILLAGE IN THE MIDDLE OF A FARMING AREA. IN THE PAST FEW YEARS THERE HAS BEEN SOME RESIDENTIAL DEVELOPMENT BUT ONCE THE LANDERMERE GREEN ESTATE IS COMPLETED THERE WILL ONLY BE INFILL BUILDING PERMITTED FOR THE FORSEEABLE FUTURE. THERE ARE MANY ATTRACTIVE OLD HOUSES IN THE AREA AND RECENTLY A WELL KNOWN LOCAL BUILDING FIRM, THOMAS WEBB AND SONS, HAS TIDIED UP THE HIGH STREET BY RENOVATING TWO SETS OF DILAPIDATED COTTAGES. PROPERTY IN THORPE TENDS TO BE MORE EXPENSIVE THAN IN THE SURROUNDING AREAS DUE TO THE POPULARITY OF THE VILLAGE AND THE EASY ACCESS BY ROAD AND RAIL TO LONDON. IT HAS A WIDE RANGE OF SHOPS, INCLUDING A CHEMIST, AND SERVES AS A CENTRE FOR THE SURROUNDING VILLAGES OF TENDRING, STONES GREEN AND BEAUMONT-CUM MOZE. 5 OF ITS SHOPS ARE ANTIQUE SHOPS.
